sentence.Network_en: It was a moonless night, and many stars were apparent.
sentence.Network_cn: 那天晚上没有月光, 可以看见许多星星.

sentence.Network_en: That was a dark, moonless night.
sentence.Network_cn: 那是一个黑暗的 、 无月光的夜晚.

sentence.Network_en: It was a windy and moonless night.

哈利波特与凤凰的谕令 - □-... ... moonish 月亮似的－慕许 moonless 无月光的－木立思 (Vicky Authority 权力)=>斯莱特林.
It was a dark , moonless , cloudless , starry night ., 这是一个黑暗的 , 没有月亮的 , 晴朗无云 , 星夜.
On a moonless night the path was dark and gloomy , giving one the creeps ., 在一个没有月光的晚上 , 路上阴森森的 , 使人感到非常害怕.

the inky darkness of a moonless night ., 无月之夜的一片黑暗.

entry.def: A moonless sky or night is dark because there is no moon.

means.word_mean: 1. without a moon or a visible moon;
